com.capricorn.entity

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.capricorn.entity.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    As defined, the size of the board should be 4-letters'-long and 4-letters'-wide. Applying cell to generate a 4*4 board with 16 letters.
    Author:
    Dongsheng Wang, Chen Li, Yu Li, Tianyu Wu, Bowen Sun
